title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Jamel Herring is getting back in the ring
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - Jamel Herring is getting back in the ring
description:
Chris sits down with Dan Cannobbio from Inside Boxing Live and the former 130-pound champion, Jamel Herring. The guys discuss Jamel getting back in the ring and the reasons why he has a new team around him and the latest with Gervonta Davis and Ryan Garcia. A little later, the longtime promoter Lou DiBella talks with Chris about the George Kambosos-Devin Haney fight.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
